CrbnCreditDistribution.name: CrbnCreditDistribution
CrbnCreditDistribution.description: Represents a junction between the sustainability credit and carbon credit allocation objects. To offset emissions for carbon credit allocation items, specify the emissions activity on this junction object.

CrbnCrAllocDate.description: The date when the carbon credit was allocated.

CrbnCreditAllocId.description: The carbon credit allocation record that's associated with the carbon credits distribution.

EmissionsActivityId.description: The emissions activity that's specified to offset emissions at carbon credit allocation items level.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the carbon credit allocation.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SustainabilityCreditId.description: The sustainability credit record that's associated with the carbon credits distribution.

TotalCrbnCrAllocCost.description: The total cost of the carbon credits that were allocated for all the emissions activities.

TotalCrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The total carbon credits that were allocated for all the emissions activities.
